title: Successful login via Magic Link
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully by requesting a magic link via email and accessing the app through that link.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a registered email address
Click the 'Send Magic Link' button
Check that a confirmation message is displayed indicating that the magic link has been sent
Open the received email and click the magic link
Verify the user is redirected to the app and authenticated successfully

title: Login failure with unregistered email
description: Ensure that attempting to request a magic link with an unrecognized email shows appropriate error feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter an unregistered or invalid email address
Click the 'Send Magic Link' button
Check that an error message is shown indicating the email is not recognized

title: Dashboard displays current balance and recent transactions
description: Verify the dashboard loads within 2 seconds and displays a correct summary of the current financial status with clear graphs and last transaction list.

steps.description: Login successfully via magic link
Verify the dashboard page loads within 2 seconds
Check that current balance is displayed correctly
Verify graphical trend charts are rendered and accurately reflect transactions
Confirm the latest transactions list shows recent entries with correct data

title: Create a new income transaction quickly
description: Verify that recording a new gain transaction can be completed in less than 10 seconds with no more than 3 clicks.

steps.description: Access the 'New Transaction' form from the dashboard
Select 'Gain' as transaction type
Input valid amount and select category quickly using the numeric keypad and quick selection
Submit the form
Confirm the transaction is recorded and appears on the dashboard
Verify total steps and time taken is within allowed limits (max 3 clicks, under 10 seconds)

title: Prevent negative or invalid values in transaction form
description: Ensure the transaction form validates inputs to block negative amounts and invalid dates before submission.

steps.description: Open the 'New Transaction' form
Enter negative number in amount field
Check that input validation rejects the negative value and shows error feedback
Enter an invalid date format
Verify the date field validation prevents submission and displays an error

title: List, filter, edit and delete transactions
description: Validate full management of transaction list including filtering by category and date, editing entries, and deleting transactions.

steps.description: Navigate to the transactions list page
Check all transactions are listed with correct details
Apply filters by category and date range
Verify filtered list matches criteria
Select a transaction and edit its details
Save updated transaction
Confirm changes are persisted and reflected in the list and dashboard
Delete a transaction
Verify the transaction is removed and balance updates accordingly

title: Import CSV with preview and automatic categorization
description: Test the import process for CSV bank statements with up to 1000 lines, including file upload, preview of parsed data, mapping fields and confirmation of import.

steps.description: Navigate to the CSV import page
Upload a valid CSV file with up to 1000 lines
Check that data preview renders correctly with parsed fields
Map CSV columns to app categories if required
Confirm import of transactions
Verify that transactions are correctly added and categorized in the system
Ensure import process completes in under 30 seconds

title: OCR extraction of receipt details with review and edit
description: Validate the functionality of scanning or uploading receipts to extract value and date via OCR with at least 80% correctness, and allow user to edit extracted info before saving.

steps.description: Navigate to the receipt scanning page
Upload an image of a receipt or capture via camera
Verify OCR extracts value and date fields
Edit extracted fields if necessary
Save the receipt as a transaction
Confirm the transaction is correctly saved with user-reviewed data

title: Offline usage with synchronization on reconnect
description: Ensure the PWA supports offline basic functionality, allowing transactions registration offline and synchronizing data automatically when internet is restored.

steps.description: Install the PWA on smartphone
Put device into offline mode
Open app and register new gain and expense transactions
Verify transactions are accepted and stored locally without errors
Reconnect device to internet
Confirm stored offline transactions synchronize with backend and appear in dashboard

title: Profile and categories customization
description: Verify users can edit profile data, create and remove categories with custom icons and colors, and that changes reflect correctly in transaction forms.

steps.description: Navigate to user settings
Edit profile information such as name and email
Check changes are saved and persisted after reload
Manage categories: add a new category with icon and color
Verify new category appears in transaction forms
Delete an existing category
Confirm category removal and absent in future transaction entries

title: Export data as CSV and Excel compatible files
description: Test exporting financial data to CSV or Excel format and verify the compatibility and correctness of exported files.

steps.description: Access data export option in settings
Select export format (CSV or Excel)
Download exported file
Open exported file in Excel or compatible software and verify all data fields are correct and no data loss occurred

title: Verification of UI usability and accessibility on mobile
description: Ensure that the entire interface is in Portuguese BR, with familiar terms and minimum 48px touch areas for all actionable buttons on smartphones.

steps.description: Use the app on a smartphone device
Verify all text is in Portuguese BR with familiar terminology
Check all interactive buttons have minimum touch area of 48px
Confirm readable font sizes and comfortable layout for finger navigation

title: Confirm security of stored data and session duration
description: Validate that user data is stored securely with encryption and automatic backup, and that authentication sessions remain valid up to 30 days.

steps.description: Login and use the app normally
Verify database records are encrypted and backed up automatically
Remain idle or close and reopen app multiple times within 30 days
Confirm user session persists and does not require frequent re-login during 30-day period
Attempt to access data without proper session
Verify Row Level Security policies block unauthorized access

title: Verify PWA installation, splash screen, and offline start
description: Ensure the app is installable as a PWA, shows customized splash screen and icons, and allows startup offline.

steps.description: Access the app in supported browser
Trigger 'Install App' prompt and install the PWA
Confirm app installs and icon appears on home screen
Restart app and observe splash screen animation and custom icons
Launch app without internet connection
Verify app launches offline and allows basic usage

title: Automatic processing of recurring expenses
description: Validate the setting up, scheduled automatic processing and API execution of recurring expenses entries.

steps.description: Navigate to recurring expenses management page
Create a new recurring expense with defined frequency and amount
Confirm the recurring expense is saved correctly
Trigger or wait for scheduled processing API to run
Verify proper transactions are generated automatically on expected dates
Edit or delete recurring expense
Confirm changes reflect accordingly on future processing
